verses.roman:
kiṁ svit tejasvināṁ tejo
bhagavān vā vibhāvasuḥ
sūryaḥ somo mahendro vā
loka-pālo paro 'pi vā

synonyms: kim svit—perhaps; tejasvinām—of all potent beings; tejaḥ—the original form; bhagavān—powerful lord; vā—or else; vibhāvasuḥ—the god of fire; sūryaḥ—the sun-god; somaḥ—the moon-god; mahā-indraḥ—the King of heaven; va—or; loka—of a planet; pālaḥ—the ruler; aparaḥ—other; api vā—else.
translation: Perhaps You are the potency of all potent beings. Or maybe You are the powerful god of fire, or the sun-god, the moon-god, the King of heaven or the ruling demigod of some other planet.
